languages.text: {n}Все присутствующие исправно играют свои роли и ничем не выдают себя. Видимо, Мастер дисциплины как следует проинструктировала каждого. В том числе насчет того, где скрыть оружие — вы никак не можете определить, где же под одеждой оно спрятано.{/n}

{n}The facade is holding, with everyone playing their role perfectly. The Master-at-Arms must have instructed them thoroughly and shown them how best to conceal their weapons. All of them are wearing their best, and even you cannot tell where they are hiding their armaments.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Все присутствующие исправно играют свои роли и ничем не выдают себя. Видимо, Мастер дисциплины как следует проинструктировала каждого. В том числе насчет того, где скрыть оружие — вы никак не можете определить, где же под одеждой оно спрятано.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Everyone is faithfully playing their parts and not giving themselves away. The Master-at-Arms must have instructed everyone personally, Including where to conceal the weapons. Everyone is dressed their best, but you cannot tell where they are hiding the armaments.{/n}

{n}Everyone is faithfully playing their parts and not giving themselves away. The Master-at-Arms must have instructed everyone personally, Including where to conceal the weapons. Everyone is dressed their best, but you cannot tell where they are hiding the armaments.{/n}

{n}The facade is holding, with everyone playing their role perfectly. The Master-at-Arms must have instructed them personally and shown them how best to conceal their weapons. All of them are wearing their best, and even you cannot tell where they are hiding their armaments.{/n}

{n}The facade is holding, with everyone playing their role perfectly. The Master-at-Arms must have instructed them personally and shown them how best to conceal their weapons. All of them are wearing their best, and even you cannot tell where they are hiding their armaments.{/n}

{n}The facade is holding, with everyone playing their role perfectly. The Master-at-Arms must have instructed them thoroughly and shown them how best to conceal their weapons. All of them are wearing their best, and even you cannot tell where they are hiding their armaments.{/n}

{n}The facade is holding, with everyone playing their role perfectly. The Master-at-Arms must have instructed them thoroughly and shown them how best to conceal their weapons. All of them are wearing their best, and even you cannot tell where they are hiding their armaments.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Fassade hält, alle spielen ihre Rolle perfekt. Der Waffenmeister muss sie gründlich angeleitet und ihnen gezeigt haben, wie sie ihre Waffen am besten verbergen. Alle tragen ihre beste Kleidung, und selbst du kannst nicht sagen, wo sie ihre Waffen verstecken.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The facade is holding, with everyone playing their role perfectly. The Master-at-Arms must have instructed them thoroughly and shown them how best to conceal their weapons. All of them are wearing their best, and even you cannot tell where they are hiding their armaments.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Fassade hält, alle spielen ihre Rolle perfekt. Der Waffenmeister muss sie gründlich angeleitet und ihnen gezeigt haben, wie sie ihre Waffen am besten verbergen. Alle tragen ihre beste Kleidung, und selbst du kannst nicht sagen, wo sie ihre Waffen verstecken.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La mascarada se mantiene; todos interpretan su papel a la perfección. La maestra de armas debe de haber instruido meticulosamente a los guardias para que disimulen sus armas. Todos llevan sus mejores pertrechos, y ni siquiera tú eres capaz de distinguir dónde los ocultan.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The facade is holding, with everyone playing their role perfectly. The Master-at-Arms must have instructed them thoroughly and shown them how best to conceal their weapons. All of them are wearing their best, and even you cannot tell where they are hiding their armaments.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La mascarada se mantiene; todos interpretan su papel a la perfección. La maestra de armas debe de haber instruido meticulosamente a los guardias para que disimulen sus armas. Todos llevan sus mejores pertrechos, y ni siquiera tú eres capaz de distinguir dónde los ocultan.{/n}

languages.text: {n}全員がそれぞれの役割を完璧にこなし、表向きはなんとかなっている。マスター・アット・アームが徹底的に指導して、武器を隠す一番の方法を教えたに違いない。みんな適切な服装をしていて、どこに武器を隠しているか、あなたにさえもわからない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The facade is holding, with everyone playing their role perfectly. The Master-at-Arms must have instructed them thoroughly and shown them how best to conceal their weapons. All of them are wearing their best, and even you cannot tell where they are hiding their armaments.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}全員がそれぞれの役割を完璧にこなし、表向きはなんとかなっている。マスター・アット・アームが徹底的に指導して、武器を隠す一番の方法を教えたに違いない。みんな適切な服装をしていて、どこに武器を隠しているか、あなたにさえもわからない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}所有人的伪装都非常到位，完美地扮演着各自的角色。戒律大师肯定是对他们进行了彻底的指导，教他们如何不露痕迹地隐藏武器。所有人都穿着漂亮的衣服，就连你都看不出来他们把武器藏到了什么地方。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The facade is holding, with everyone playing their role perfectly. The Master-at-Arms must have instructed them thoroughly and shown them how best to conceal their weapons. All of them are wearing their best, and even you cannot tell where they are hiding their armaments.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}所有人的伪装都非常到位，完美地扮演着各自的角色。戒律大师肯定是对他们进行了彻底的指导，教他们如何不露痕迹地隐藏武器。所有人都穿着漂亮的衣服，就连你都看不出来他们把武器藏到了什么地方。{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'illusion est totale et chacun joue son rôle à la perfection. Le capitaine leur a sans doute donné des consignes détaillées et montré comment dissimuler leurs armes au mieux. Tous portent leurs plus beaux atours et vous seriez bien en peine de dire où ils cachent leur armement.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The facade is holding, with everyone playing their role perfectly. The Master-at-Arms must have instructed them thoroughly and shown them how best to conceal their weapons. All of them are wearing their best, and even you cannot tell where they are hiding their armaments.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'illusion est totale et chacun joue son rôle à la perfection. Le capitaine leur a sans doute donné des consignes détaillées et montré comment dissimuler leurs armes au mieux. Tous portent leurs plus beaux atours et vous seriez bien en peine de dire où ils cachent leur armement.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Herkesin rolünü mükemmel bir şekilde oynaması sayesinde aldatıcı görüntü, inandırıcılığını koruyor. Silahtar, onlara talimatları detaylı olarak iletip silahlarını en iyi şekilde nasıl saklayacaklarını göstermiş olmalı. Herkes karakterine en iyi şekilde bürünmüş. Sen bile silahlarını sakladıklarını fark edemiyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The facade is holding, with everyone playing their role perfectly. The Master-at-Arms must have instructed them thoroughly and shown them how best to conceal their weapons. All of them are wearing their best, and even you cannot tell where they are hiding their armaments.{/n}
